summary: Email exchange between Michael Miller, a member of Jeffrey Epstein's legal team, and an unnamed recipient regarding arrangements for Dr. Michael Baden to observe Epstein's autopsy on August 11, 2019. The email confirms Baden's scheduled attendance at 9 AM.

persons.name: Michael Miller
persons.context: Identifies himself as part of Jeffrey Epstein's legal team and coordinates the autopsy observation arrangements.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The deceased individual whose autopsy is being discussed.

persons.name: Michael Baden
persons.context: Arranged by Epstein's legal team to observe the autopsy of Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Miller identifies himself as part of Epstein's legal team, indicating a professional legal representation relationship.
Miller arranged for Baden to observe Epstein's autopsy on behalf of the legal team.
Baden was engaged by Epstein's legal team to observe the autopsy, indicating a professional service relationship.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein Autopsy
events.description: The autopsy of Jeffrey Epstein is scheduled, with arrangements made for Michael Baden to observe on behalf of Epstein's legal team.

keyFacts: Michael Miller, part of Jeffrey Epstein's legal team, coordinated for Dr. Michael Baden to observe Epstein's autopsy.
The autopsy was scheduled for August 11, 2019, with Baden expected at 9 AM.
This email exchange occurred shortly after Epstein's death, showing immediate legal team involvement in the autopsy process.
